EmailTemplate.subject: Don't Worry, Be HAPPy
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Act Now! Protect Your Learjet 45 before June 30th, 2017 Dear valued customer,
Your avionics are a big investment…an investment worth protecting. Designed specifically for business aviation, the Honeywell Avionics Protection Plan (HAPP) is an extended warranty program that offers full coverage for Honeywell avionics – because the unexpected can happen.
With your DU870 display units reaching the end of their life there has never been a better time to take out HAPP. Enroll now and the protection HAPP offers means you'll have access to DU870 exchange support till the end of 2020.
What's more enroll in HAPP through ExecuJet South Africa before June 30th 2017 and you’ll receive a 15% discount on the annual enrollment fees. For example, standard HAPP pricing for a Lear 45, flying 300 hours per year, with standard equipment would be US$49,500. Sign up before June 30th and the cost will be US$ 42,075 – a saving of US$7,425!! The discount is applicable on the duration of the HAPP contract – so the longer you commit to HAPP – the more you’ll save!
So don't worry, be HAPPy.
Warwick
